profile:
AGM Renovations experts provide quality basement and Bathroom Renovation services throughout the GTA and the surrounding area. See our Service Area for the complete list of towns where our  renovation services are offered. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee on our workmanship and offer competitive prices with exceptional quality.

Expect more and when you need the best; trust AGM Renovations. We guarantee that you will be completely satisfied, which means that you don't pay until you are satisfied.
Our mission is to be committed to excel in the work we do. We are committed to excel and maintain a sense of pride in our all we do!

products: AGM Renovations, Basement finishing, Basement Renovations, Basement Reno, Finishing Basements, Basement Company, Finished Basements, Basement Expert, Finished Basements Company, Bathroom Renovations
services:
AGM Renovations offers Complete basement and Bathroom renovations packages from the professional design through the professional cleaning including:

Drywall- We employ only professional drywall installers and our goal is deliver complete satisfaction to each and every client with the quality of our workmanship and our prompt, reliable service.
    
Taping- Our drywall taping techniques will bring a high quality smooth finish, with a level of excellence you will take pride in.

Painting- We include all wall priming, painting of ceilings, baseboards, casing, crown and cove moldings into our basement construction packages
    
High Grade Laminate Flooring- is standard in our basement renovations packages.

Tiling- Shower, bathroom, or kitchenette tiling will be done by professional tile installers who are employed directly by AGM. A 2 year unlimited warranty is provided to you standard when you finish your basement with AGM
   
Plumbing- Our licensed plumbers will ensure that no problem is left unsolved and you can be sure that any drain or other plumbing defects left by the original house builder will be fixed effectively.

Electrical- We are committed to providing fully licensed electrician service as part of our standard package. Should you ever require an electrical certificate when you decide to sell your property, we will be happy to provide it to you

profile:
Timeless in style, dependable in performance and exceptional in design, look to Rockstella Stonery to craft the perfect granite, marble or quartz countertop for your home or office. A natural option for kitchen countertops, bathroom vanities and tub surrounds, these materials are also excellent alternatives for fireplaces, bar tops, reception desks and more. We handle all aspects of design, fabrication and installation, and are always prepared to take on a variety of projects, from single vanities to full-scale home installs to multi-unit projects.

***

We distinguish the caliber of our work at Rockstella not just through outstanding craftsmanship and affordable pricing, but more importantly, through an unparalleled level of service. We’ve earned a reputation for being timely, approachable and efficient, and we always plan our consults and installs at a time that suits your schedule – whether it’s business hours, weekends or after hours. It also bears pointing out that we work directly with you – there are no sub-contractors involved – from on-site measuring to individual slab selection to professional installation.

***

At Rockstella Stonery, we like to refer to the unique style and design of our stone options as affordable luxury – an option that will stand out in your home or place of work and that will endure for ages. We’re based in Stoney Creek, and are ready to provide our services to clients throughout Hamilton, Niagara region and GTA.

profile:
GTA Countertops has more than 10 years of combined experience in the fabrication and installation of stone products. We purchase a carefully selected variety of granite, marble and quartz in large quantities and stock it locally. This system allows us to offer the luxury of real, natural granite or quartz counter tops at very affordable prices.
 
We pride ourselves in helping you achieve a more beautiful, money saving and practical approach to improving your dream home, we do not outsource any part of your project to another company, from start to finish, it is completed by our company!

profile:
We Take Your House & Make It Your Home! 

From small exterior upgrades to complete home renovations, let our experienced, professional team make your next home project a breeze.
With our team's 20 combined years of renovation experience, we offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee on all our work. 

Our services include:

-Decks & Fences
-Kitchen Renovation/Remodeling
-Custom kitchen cabinets
-Custom washroom vanities
-Custom laundry room cabinets
-Custom countertops & backsplash
-Bathroom Renovation/Remodeling
-Basement Finishing
-Flooring (Ceramic tiles, Hardwood Flooring, Vinyl, Laminate)
-Stairs and Railings
-Plumbing Services
-Electrical Services
-Handyman services

Take the hassle out of your next home project and call the experts at Homes by Adam!

profile:
We at Marvellous Contracting believe that our service, Quality and Craftsmanship is our number one priority in the services we have to offer! 
We are fully licensed and insured. We will not be satisfied until our customers are completely satisfied. 
We are focused on giving quality client care to every one of our customers. 

Our dedication is to work with every customer from the planning stage to the development stage to guarantee your necessities are met in a convenient way. 
All remodels will run into startling difficulties, and we will work with you to guarantee these are set out agreeable to you and, obviously, to code! 
Our responsibility likewise guarantees spotless and respectful staff, and a clean work territory, which is tidied up toward the finish of each workday.

Call us today and find out how we can help you with your upcoming project at an affordable cost!

profile:
Honesty, integrity, and Quality Workmanship

Reno~Ventions is a fully licensed and insured residential and commercial general contracting company. We have been exceeding customer expectations with every job completed for over twenty years. Our quality workmanship has earned us a reputation as one of the Regions premiere contractors for both commercial and residential projects. We specialize in complete home improvements, renovations, and remodeling. We do possess the knowledge, confidence, and experience to complete every project with 100% satisfaction to our valued clients.

Our projects have a 98% on-time completion record!

Reno ~ Ventions commitments:

5 year written warranty on our labor
On schedule completion dates
Cost-effective process from beginning to end
Final product exceeds expectations
Honesty, integrity, and great value
 Your satisfaction is our #1 priority!

profile:
About Us
Zzone Homes Inc. We are a full-service interior home renovation company that has been in the business for 21 years. Our certified trade network consists of everyone you will ever need to tackle any home renovation, repair and installation in your home. Our team of professionals is all employed in-house all under one roof. This allows us to offer top-level service, and stay on schedule and budget every time.

Our services included:
~ Design and Build Packages for Kitchens - Bathrooms -Basements 
~ Kitchen Renovations 
~ Complete Home Remodels 
~ Bathroom Renovations
~ Basement Finishing
~ Custom Cabinets 
~ Structural Modification and engineering 

All of our design and build projects, as well as our professional trade services, come with an industry-leading warranty. I stand behind all of our work to the end.

If you’re interested in taking advantage of a free consultation call with me, Marco Manazzone, owner-operator of Zzone Homes Inc and 21-year experienced general contractor, then please book today! I look forward to talking to you about your project.
